about_the_game: Gambatte is an accuracy-focused, open-source, cross-platform handheld system written in C++. It is based on hundreds of corner case hardware tests, as well as previous documentation and reverse engineering efforts. Gambatte will let you play handheld contents from 1988.
detailed_description: Gambatte is an accuracy-focused, open-source, cross-platform handheld system written in C++. It is based on hundreds of corner case hardware tests, as well as previous documentation and reverse engineering efforts. Gambatte will let you play handheld contents from 1988.
legal_notice:
RetroArch is free/open source software, available under the GNU GPL 3.0 license.

It does not contain any copyrighted material by third parties. RetroArch does not condone piracy in any way, shape or form.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux-based distro
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 and up (CPU with SSE2 instructions required)
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux-based distro
  • Processor: Intel Core series or AMD equivalent

name: RetroArch - Gambatte

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 and up (CPU with SSE2 instructions required)
  • Graphics: Any GPU and driver that supports OpenGL v2.0 or higher
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core series or AMD equivalent
  • Graphics: Intel: At least Intel HD 4K required for OpenGL, any compliant D3D11 GPU for Direct3D 11. Should support at least Shader Model 3.0 and/or 4.0.

short_description: Gambatte is an accuracy-focused, open-source, cross-platform handheld system written in C++.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Dutch, Greek, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Swedish, Turkish, Vietnamese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Spain
